casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Stephan David BROOKS. No. 215P02-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Stephan D. Brooks, Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th day of June 2004 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
